hero.name: Cody Rose
hero.about: I'm an Austin-based developer who loves contributing to open source software and building beautiful, challenging, and efficient websites with React and Typescript. I'm trying my best to learn as much as I can and share what I learn with others.

projects.title: Budget App
projects.description: A full stack expense tracking app built with React, Typescript, Redux, and Firebase.

projects.title: BotW Cooking
projects.description: An app for the Breath of the Wild cooking system built with React and Typescript.

projects.title: Signature Builder
projects.description: An email signature builder built with React.

about: I'm a Front End Developer in Austin, TX interested in working (remotely) on challenging projects using React and Typescript.
I have several years of agency experience building websites from design mockups, but my knowledge of React is all self-taught.
